meanings.definition: A member of a criminal organization, especially the Mafia.
meanings.sent1: The goodfella was known for his connections in the city.
meanings.sent2: The police were after the goodfella for his illegal activities.
meanings.sent3: The goodfella tried to sell his stolen goods at the local market.
meanings.sent4: In the dark alley, the goodfella whispered secrets to his associates.
meanings.sent5: The goodfella's presence sent shivers down everyone's spine.

meanings.definition: A man who is loyal, trustworthy, and reliable.
meanings.sent1: My grandfather was a true goodfella, always there to help.
meanings.sent2: The goodfella kept his promise and never let his friends down.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone relied on the goodfella to bring the music.
meanings.sent4: He was the goodfella of the office, always finishing his work on time.
meanings.sent5: When in trouble, you can count on the goodfella to have your back.
